Posts.Content: firstly,red dragon,it seems you are suffering with this chemo like i am. i had my second fec july 28th and 12 days later am STILL feeling sick even though i am taking anti sickness pills.they have tried me on about 6 different ones now, with no good results.i am DREADING my next session on august 18th.i am even seriously thinking of not having it.i also feel constantly tired,sore mouth, constipted and dry eyes.i've got it all, unfortunately, but the sickness is the worst thing imaginably.noj, have are you getting on, i am interested to hear how you are after your first taxtere (is this the right spelling !!!!)
Posts.Title: Has anyone chosen not to have chemo?

Posts.Content: hi everyone, i have read all your posts with interest.i am so glad most people seem to feel pretty normal with their chemo.i feel like i am going to die.i have never felt so sick in all my life.i am on 3 fec /3 taxtere.currently having just had my 2nd fec. i feel so sick from the minute i have the chemo and can't eat for the first 4 days, then maybe a little soup or an ice lolly.i am on a lot of anti sickness pills,not sure if they work or not, because i still feel bad, although my sense of smell isn't so acute,thank goodness.last time i just started feeling a bit better,a few days before my next session.i don't know if i would have agreed to chemo if i had known it would be so bad.i don't know what to do for the best.carol.x
Posts.Title: Has anyone chosen not to have chemo?

Posts.Content: hi dove, thanks for your advice.yes,i'm on 3 fec/3 taxoterre,my last fec being next week, 18th.i am on day 13 now and today is the first day i haven't felt sick.i am going to make the most of the next week,i need to eat and put on a bit of weight firstly,just to give me some energy.you're right,i am going to call someone and say i need help for the next fec.there was some mention of giving me a syringe driver so i could control the anti sickness !!!!!!!!! i will say about reducing the chemo,i was/am seriously considering stopping it altogether,but i know that would be silly.as you say, maybe,just maybe, the taxoterre might not be so bad,noone seems to know.we'll see. carol x
